org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Interface IAeAttachmentManager

All Superinterfaces:
IAeManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractAttachmentManager
public interface IAeAttachmentManager
extends IAeManager

A generic attachment manager that provides a means of serializing and converting attachments formats.

Method Summary
 void associateProcess(IAeAttachmentContainer aContainer, long aProcessId)
          Associates the attachments in the given attachment container with the given process.
 java.util.List bpel2wsio(IAeAttachmentContainer aBpelContainer)
          Convert attachment items from bpel to wsio format.

          Deserializes a stored attachment to a stream.
 void removeAttachment(long aAttachmentId)
          Removes an attachment.
 void responseFilled(long aProcessId)
          Notifies the attachment manager that the engine has finished populating a synchronous response for the given process.
 void responsePending(long aProcessId)
          Notifies the attachment manager that the engine is waiting to populate a synchronous response for the given process.
 void storeAttachments(IAeAttachmentContainer aContainer, IAeProcessPlan aPlan)
          Stores the attachments in the given container.
 void storeAttachments(IAeAttachmentContainer aContainer, IAeProcessPlan aPlan, long aProcessId)
          Stores the attachments in the given container and associates the attachments with the given process (unless aProcessId is IAeBusinessProcess.NULL_PROCESS_ID).
 IAeAttachmentContainer wsio2bpel(java.util.List aWsioAttachments)
          Convert attachment items from wsio to bpel format.

responseFilled

public void responseFilled(long aProcessId)
Notifies the attachment manager that the engine has finished populating a synchronous response for the given process.

Parameters:
aProcessId -

responsePending

public void responsePending(long aProcessId)
Notifies the attachment manager that the engine is waiting to populate a synchronous response for the given process. Since the response may include attachments, the attachment manager must hold onto any attachments for the process until the engine calls responseFilled(long).

Parameters:
aProcessId -

storeAttachments

public void storeAttachments(IAeAttachmentContainer aContainer,
                             IAeProcessPlan aPlan)
                      throws AeBusinessProcessException
Stores the attachments in the given container.

Parameters:
aContainer -
aPlan - May determine whether the attachments are stored locally or persistently

AeBusinessProcessException

public void storeAttachments(IAeAttachmentContainer aContainer,
                             IAeProcessPlan aPlan,
                             long aProcessId)
                      throws AeBusinessProcessException
Stores the attachments in the given container and associates the attachments with the given process (unless aProcessId is IAeBusinessProcess.NULL_PROCESS_ID).
